column6: Must vehicles of this type finally return to their respective starting depots?

column8: The AC could be almost static at TP6; and it itself has the VD5 hosted with rescue speed boats. It will send boats for a recuse mission in the Andamans. The Boats return to the AC after the operation.
Speeds may also vary based on condition of roads in the different MMTS
